I worked directly with Paul when he was a CFO at Trax Technologies. His strategic vision, problem-solving abilities, results-oriented mindset, strong work ethic and reliability are the qualities that make him a great mentor and leader in Finance. He set the ball in motion and is willing to do whatever is necessary to bring about the desired results. He has extreme attention to details to produce accurate and timely information at the same time never lose sight on the “big picture”. He keeps an open line of communication, listens and works for his team. He is a leader that you can trust and depend on, an asset to any organization.  I enjoyed working for him as Regional Controller in Trax Technologies.

October 21, 2008, Paul was a client of Simer’s

Valor IT was hired as our outsourced IT service provider prior to me becoming CFO for our organization.  The principles driving the relationship were affordability, consistent and reliable performance of work, and completion of projects.Upon assuming my role, I met with Valor IT personnel to understand the business relationship, issues they encountered to service our organization seamlessly, and to understand the general IT infrastructure.I found Valor IT to act as true owners of the process and business.  They took pride in the work they performed, ownership of the specific projects contracted, and understanding our complex business structure.  As usual in any business relationship, unexpected issues arose that required around the clock support and Valor stepped up to address the issues even at the expense of completing other projects.  I found them to be flexible and performing critical tasks while driving to fulfill contractual related requirements.As our contract expired, we were working collaboratively towards globalizing our IT operation and structuring a contract that would be win-win for both organizations.  I found the executive team at Valor to be creative in their approach, cost effective (savings anticipated would have exceeded the incremental cost of adding additional resources on a global basis), and extremely trustworthy.  In fact, Simer was extremely open in the negotiations on truly assisting our organization on stabilizing our IT platform, providing additional services at a great value.I would highly recommend Valor and would consider utilizing their services with other companies that I support.
